item.title: Dive into K8s 02: Cilium Replaces Flannel â€” Goodbye VXLAN Tax, Hello eBPF Native Networking
item.description: Last post, we hand-rolled Flannel in Kind cluster and witnessed the 50-byte per-packet VXLAN encapsulation overhead via tcpdump. This time, we replace Flannel with Cilium, leveraging eBPF to completely eliminate this “network tax”, and use Hubble for traffic visualization.
